website_summaries.verdict: The AND 1 Attack Mid is a great performance shoe. A few may be concerned with its price, but these kicks prove to be comfortable, supportive, durable, and aesthetically appealing. Aside from all these positive attributes, it is also versatile enough to suit any position. It is also quite affordable given the quality of the materials used on this mid-top basketball shoe.
pros: The tread pattern of the AND 1 Attack Mid delivers solid performance, say some wearers
One buyer says that he likes his AND 1 Attack Mid shoes so much that he decided to buy two more in different colorways
Most testers observe that these AND 1 basketball sneakers are true to size
A good number of reviewers rave with how amazing the cushioning of the Attack Mid is
The majority of testers attest that after weeks of playing in the shoe, it remains comfortable and sturdy
Several mention that for quick and lateral movements, the outrigger deliver great support
It is as stable as the first Kobe Zoom Protro from Nike
Many AND 1 Attack Mid owner say that the details in the upper are amazing especially the tiger print at the heel
Although these AND 1 sneakers are expensive, many buyers still say that the shoe is a must-have because of the quality of the materials used
cons: There are wearers who claim that the AND 1 Attack Mid are great at first
but after a few months, the materials start to wear out
According to a lot of shoppers, these AND 1 sneakers are quite expensive
It is almost as costly as the signature shoes of Adidas including the well-reviewed Dame Lillard 5

customer_reviews.title: SWEET DEAL, SWEET SHOE.
customer_reviews.text: Sweet Shoe “just a little snug” but And1’s run a little small. It hurts me to put this add on: I love the look of my shoes but, I am very dissapointed that every step that I take they make a gripping noise. So I have to stop wearing them and purchase another pair of shoes because these can’t be worn.
customer_reviews.author: Las Vegas Raheem

customer_reviews.title: Decent Outside Basketball Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really like the shoe for outside basketball. It is tough, durable and weathers a good full court game. I had this shoe for a few months and can tell you, it is a decent basketball shoe for outdoor tough courts. I will likely buy this shoe again and recommend it. I have very wide feet and this is okay, not as wide as I would like, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Kentjax

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy and Nylon eyelets not expected.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with holes in shipping bag (appeared as though someone was looking to see what kind of shoe/size). Size slightly small. Nylon eyelets on outside not expected or wanted. Shoes are very heavy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent values compared to other brands!
customer_reviews.text: This pair of shoes provided excellent support and grip on the basketball court. It is reasonably priced compared to other more expensive brands while provide comparable performance.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a snug fit go true to size if you want a looser more casual fit go up half a size. The shoes are wonderful, very comfortable in the heel and midfoot, nice locked in fit with good while walking. Really love the shoe and couldn’t recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Is Beautiful.So much Love
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes..Fits Great on my sons feet..Thanks a lot Amazon,,You guys are beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Letisha

customer_reviews.title: Basketball
customer_reviews.text: One of the insoles were missing. Not a big issue since I took a pair from a pair I don’t wear. But overall one of the best Shoes I’ve purchased. I already own a pair and just wanted another.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander M.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The shoe definitely looks better in person have yet to wear them it's a good quality built shoes
customer_reviews.author: S. Sangster

customer_reviews.title: Super clean!
customer_reviews.text: I was always a fan growing up of the AND1 mixtapes and the shoes and these shoes continue to live up to what AND1 stands for true street basketball and pro ball I'm getting the stephon marbury's next.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter, as there are not manner girl bball shoes to choose from. She lived them and the fit and perform great.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: For snugged on me but fit just right on my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of cushioning a good looking shoe! Used for coaching basketball to match our teams colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This issue has proven to be one of the best performing shoes I've had recently with a price point ...
customer_reviews.text: This issue has proven to be one of the best performing shoes I've had recently with a price point as low as this I can completely recommend this for both indoor and outdoor play. And one is trying to better their shoe quality and I think it's working truly outstanding performance.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: NICE BASKETBALL SHOE!
customer_reviews.text: Although I wear a size 13, I purchased a 14 to insert an additional inner sole cushion(foot problem)and have enough toe room for a thick sock. They come with a glued insole; the AND1 ATTACK MID are very comfortable and have a quality outer tread. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Denise holley

product_meta.title: AND 1 Men's Attack Mid Basketball Shoe, White/Super Foil/Gum, 8 UK
product_meta.description: New for spring/summer 2018, the attack mid delivers a new performance last and the fit in a mid cut design, for the most aggressive player on the court. The subtle big cat heel motif will inspire you to hunt stats like a predator.
feature_bullets: Sleek micromesh upper with strategic substrate chopouts for lightweight breathability.
Anatomically engineered collar for superior comfort and support.
Nylon ghillie eyelets, attached to interior foot bed, provide speedy and secure lockdown.
Full length Harmonix RX cushioning inlayed with injected EVA. Robust tread pattern for indoor/outdoor versatility.
Injection molded shank for protection and stability.
